channel.title: centos8 on Colynn.Liu

item.title: Centos 8 Tips
item.description: 系统yum源调整 # centos 8 $ wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo http://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/Centos-8.repo # centos 7 $ wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo http://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/Centos-7.repo # centos 6 $ wget -O /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo http://mirrors.aliyun.com/repo/Centos-6.repo Active ip addr on centos 8 nmcli c r eth0 ; nmcli d r eth0
